Name: Infinite Sunshine Dust
About the game: Infinite Sunshine Dust (ISD) is a psychedelic horror adventure game. Four prisoners wander a virtual world for insane experiment and they get involved with many, many strange things. This game is somewhat inspired by LSD Dream Emulator. (I used the similar acronym because I just wanted to use the word; Sunshine dust.) Features -Original graphic & BGM -Various map style generated by a Neural Style -Default mode (infinite) and story mode -A bunch of hallucinations : In addition to visual effects, there are more effects that affect to sound and control. -Unpredictable events !Caution : There is unpleasant content in this game.
